title: Brief Comments on Jordan Peterson's Response to the Cathy Newman Dustup
description:
Terrific Interview done by a Dutch Blog. https://youtu.be/E6qBxn_hFDQ 

Wonderful piece in the Atlantic exposing the pernicious habit of what is passing for journalism on the right and the left. https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2018/01/putting-monsterpaint-onjordan-peterson/550859/
